  • Classes in flex2.compiler.common used by flex2.compiler 
    Class and Description
    SinglePathResolver
    Defines the API for path resolver implemenations.
  • Classes in flex2.compiler.common used by flex2.compiler.common 
    Class and Description
    CompilerConfiguration
    This class defines the compiler related configuration options.
    Configuration
    Tools like mxmlc and compc use configuration objects to store configuration options parsed from config files and command-line options.
    Configuration.RslPathInfo
    Capture the information in one argument specifing -runtime-shared-libraries-path information.
    ConfigurationPathResolver
    Resolves files in a way specific to configuration files.
    FontsConfiguration
    This class defines the fonts related configuration options.
    FontsConfiguration.Languages
    Defines a subconfiguration for font languages.
    FramesConfiguration
    This class defines the frame related configuration options.
    FramesConfiguration.FrameInfo
    This value object represents a frame's name and classes.
    LocalFilePathResolver
    This class handles resolving absolute file paths.
    MetadataConfiguration
    This class handles metadata specific configuration options.
    MxmlConfiguration
    This class handles MXML language specific configuration options.
    NamespacesConfiguration
    This class handles namespace specific configuration options.
    RuntimeSharedLibrarySettingsConfiguration
    Configuration options association with the runtime-shared-library-path option.
    RuntimeSharedLibrarySettingsConfiguration.ApplicationDomainTarget
    Enum of the supported application domain targets of an RSL.
    SinglePathResolver
    Defines the API for path resolver implemenations.
